review_data.title: It’s a YES. Tasty&friendly
review_data.content: Been here spontaneously. Empty space on a Wed eve made us suspicious first. BUT super tasty, more upperclass pricy kinda Thai place. Top quality food and really friendly. Coming back for sure 👍

review_data.title: Wonderful Thai food with a great wine list
